body.p:
Harrodsburg Ky
January 23 63
John L Smedley Esq.
Dear Sir
Our young ^friend^ John G. Kyle will accept the office of Police Judge of Harrodsburg which is vacated by the resignation of M B Pulliam
I have forwarded some recommendations to the Governor in favor of the appointment
Will you be so kind as to solicit the Govr to appoint Kyle to the vacancy

Harrodsburg
Police Judge
Jno. G. Kyle
Com Issd Jany 27 1863
